name: Upiór
startIntroPart1: Thirsty for new adventures, my liege?
startIntroPart2: This is a nation of ancient bloodsucking beings, old and powerful, a compulsively hierarchical gerontocracy and consider themselves above all.
declaringWar: You might as well give up now, but i do like spicy food.
This will be over soon... unfortunately.
attacked: My master will not take to this kindly.
I suppose we'll have to ready the peasants to fight.
defeated: You have merely caused us a temporary setback.
We will come back to haunt you another time.
neutralHello: A warning, our master does NOT like to be disturbed,... *silently, between his teeth* and certainly not by peasants.
neutralLetsHearIt: Make haste, my master needs me elsewhere.
I have other affairs to attend to.
Are the fanged teeth to much of a distraction?
neutralNo: Perhaps you should reconsider your career.
Were you dropped on the head as an infant?
neutralYes: Well then, let's see you get to it.
Deal concluded, you may be on your way.
hateHello: What could you possibly have to say that would interest my master?
hateNo: This is an insult! ... Don't come here again if you want to stay among the living
Begone, before I feed you to my thralls!... or my master...
hateYes: You're lucky I'm not thirsty for more... today. Now leave!
afterPeace: I am happy to inform you that I spared your lives... for now.
tradeRequest: Trade is beneath me, but my advisors counsel some kind of exchange.
